reviews.review_msg: A very good prof!!   The class was amazing and he was a great guy.  Some of the stories that he picked were a little dumb though (such as that Quebec actor/theatre thing).  Others were interesting and worth the read.  He is an average marker (not so hard but not too easy either).  B+ prof :)

This was by far the worst class i have every taken, and he is by far the worst prof i have ever had. He does NOT have your best interest at heart and tries to make things HARDER on you just because he can. Please save yourself and DO NOT take a class with him.

Such a bad teacher. His French wasn't good and he made elementary mistakes.  I could see why people would like him if they're looking for an easy ride, but if you're looking at being educated, wait until a different prof teaches the class.

Sometimes Rocky does not speak very clearly, but overall he has a great teaching style.  He provides excellent and thorough feedback.  I really enjoyed the 301 class because there was room for some creative writing.  He is a fun guy, and I look forward to taking more of his classes next Spring.
Easy, friendly attitude, kind of funny. Takes attendance so show up. Take his 301 class if you can!
